verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by <WH5921> Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho, <WH3405> saying, <WH559>

Command <WH6680> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they give <WH5414> unto the Levites <WH3881> of the inheritance <WH4480> <WH5159> of their possession <WH272> cities <WH5892> to dwell in; <WH3427> and ye shall give <WH5414> also unto the Levites <WH3881> suburbs <WH4054> for the cities <WH5892> round about <WH5439> them.

And the cities <WH5892> shall they have <WH1961> to dwell in; <WH3427> and the suburbs <WH4054> of them shall be <WH1961> for their cattle, <WH929> and for their goods, <WH7399> and for all <WH3605> their beasts. <WH2416>

And the suburbs <WH4054> of the cities, <WH5892> which <WH834> ye shall give <WH5414> unto the Levites, <WH3881> shall reach from the wall <WH4480> <WH7023> of the city <WH5892> and outward <WH2351> a thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520> round about. <WH5439>

And ye shall measure <WH4058> from without <WH4480> <WH2351> the city <WH5892> on <WH853> the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits, <WH520> and on the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits, <WH520> and on the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits, <WH520> and on the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits; <WH520> and the city <WH5892> shall be in the midst: <WH8432> this <WH2088> shall be <WH1961> to them the suburbs <WH4054> of the cities. <WH5892>

And among <WH854> the cities <WH5892> which <WH834> ye shall give <WH5414> unto the Levites <WH3881> there shall be <WH853> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> for refuge, <WH4733> which <WH834> ye shall appoint <WH5414> for the manslayer, <WH7523> that he may flee <WH5127> thither: <WH8033> and to <WH5921> them ye shall add <WH5414> forty <WH705> and two <WH8147> cities. <WH5892>

So all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> which <WH834> ye shall give <WH5414> to the Levites <WH3881> shall be forty <WH705> and eight <WH8083> cities: <WH5892> them shall ye give with <WH854> their suburbs. <WH4054>

And the cities <WH5892> which <WH834> ye shall give <WH5414> shall be of the possession <WH4480> <WH272> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> from <WH4480> <WH854> them that have many <WH7227> ye shall give many; <WH7235> but from <WH4480> <WH854> them that have few <WH4592> ye shall give few: <WH4591> every one <WH376> shall give <WH5414> of his cities <WH4480> <WH5892> unto the Levites <WH3881> according to <WH6310> his inheritance <WH5159> which <WH834> he inheriteth. <WH5157>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, When <WH3588> ye <WH859> be come over <WH5674> <WH853> Jordan <WH3383> into the land <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3667>

Then ye shall appoint <WH7136> you cities <WH5892> to be <WH1961> cities <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for you; that the slayer <WH7523> may flee <WH5127> thither, <WH8033> which killeth <WH5221> any person <WH5315> at unawares. <WH7684>

And they shall be <WH1961> unto you cities <WH5892> for refuge <WH4733> from the avenger; <WH4480> <WH1350> that the manslayer <WH7523> die <WH4191> not, <WH3808> until <WH5704> he stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> in judgment. <WH4941>
And of these cities <WH5892> which <WH834> ye shall give <WH5414> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> shall ye have <WH1961> for refuge. <WH4733>

Ye shall give <WH5414> <WH853> three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> on this side <WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> and three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> shall ye give <WH5414> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which shall be <WH1961> cities <WH5892> of refuge. <WH4733>

These <WH428> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> shall be <WH1961> a refuge, <WH4733> both for the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and for the stranger, <WH1616> and for the sojourner <WH8453> among <WH8432> them: that every one <WH3605> that killeth <WH5221> any person <WH5315> unawares <WH7684> may flee <WH5127> thither. <WH8033>

And if <WH518> he smite <WH5221> him with an instrument <WH3627> of iron, <WH1270> so that he die, <WH4191> he <WH1931> is a murderer: <WH7523> the murderer <WH7523> shall surely be put to death. <WH4191> <WH4191>

And if <WH518> he smite <WH5221> him with throwing <WH3027> a stone, <WH68> wherewith <WH834> he may die, <WH4191> and he die, <WH4191> he <WH1931> is a murderer: <WH7523> the murderer <WH7523> shall surely be put to death. <WH4191> <WH4191>

Or <WH176> if he smite <WH5221> him with a hand <WH3027> weapon <WH3627> of wood, <WH6086> wherewith <WH834> he may die, <WH4191> and he die, <WH4191> he <WH1931> is a murderer: <WH7523> the murderer <WH7523> shall surely be put to death. <WH4191> <WH4191>
The revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> himself <WH1931> shall slay <WH4191> <WH853> the murderer: <WH7523> when he meeteth <WH6293> him, he <WH1931> shall slay <WH4191> him.
But if <WH518> he thrust <WH1920> him of hatred, <WH8135> or <WH176> hurl <WH7993> at <WH5921> him by laying of wait, <WH6660> that he die; <WH4191>

Or <WH176> in enmity <WH342> smite <WH5221> him with his hand, <WH3027> that he die: <WH4191> he that smote <WH5221> him shall surely be put to death; <WH4191> <WH4191> for he <WH1931> is a murderer: <WH7523> the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> shall slay <WH4191> <WH853> the murderer, <WH7523> when he meeteth <WH6293> him.

But if <WH518> he thrust <WH1920> him suddenly <WH6621> without <WH3808> enmity, <WH342> or <WH176> have cast <WH7993> upon <WH5921> him any thing <WH3605> <WH3627> without <WH3808> laying of wait, <WH6660>

Or <WH176> with any <WH3605> stone, <WH68> wherewith <WH834> a man may die, <WH4191> seeing <WH7200> him not, <WH3808> and cast <WH5307> it upon <WH5921> him, that he die, <WH4191> and was not <WH3808> his enemy, <WH341> neither <WH3808> sought <WH1245> his harm: <WH7451>
Then the congregation <WH5712> shall judge <WH8199> between <WH996> the slayer <WH5221> and the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> according to <WH5921> these <WH428> judgments: <WH4941>

And the congregation <WH5712> shall deliver <WH5337> <WH853> the slayer <WH7523> out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of the revenger <WH1350> of blood, <WH1818> and the congregation <WH5712> shall restore <WH7725> him to <WH413> the city <WH5892> of his refuge, <WH4733> whither <WH834> <WH8033> he was fled: <WH5127> and he shall abide <WH3427> in it unto <WH5704> the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> which <WH834> was anointed <WH4886> with the holy <WH6944> oil. <WH8081>

But if <WH518> the slayer <WH7523> shall at any time come without <WH3318> <WH3318> <WH853> the border <WH1366> of the city <WH5892> of his refuge, <WH4733> whither <WH834> <WH8033> he was fled; <WH5127>

And the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> find <WH4672> him without <WH4480> <WH2351> the borders <WH1366> of the city <WH5892> of his refuge, <WH4733> and the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> kill <WH7523> <WH853> the slayer; <WH7523> he shall not <WH369> be guilty of blood: <WH1818>

Because <WH3588> he should have remained <WH3427> in the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733> until <WH5704> the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> priest: <WH3548> but after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> the slayer <WH7523> shall return <WH7725> into <WH413> the land <WH776> of his possession. <WH272>
So these <WH428> things shall be <WH1961> for a statute <WH2708> of judgment <WH4941> unto you throughout your generations <WH1755> in all <WH3605> your dwellings. <WH4186>

Whoso <WH3605> killeth <WH5221> any person, <WH5315> <WH853> the murderer <WH7523> shall be put to death <WH7523> by the mouth <WH6310> of witnesses: <WH5707> but one <WH259> witness <WH5707> shall not <WH3808> testify <WH6030> against any person <WH5315> to cause him to die. <WH4191>

Moreover ye shall take <WH3947> no <WH3808> satisfaction <WH3724> for the life <WH5315> of a murderer, <WH7523> which <WH834> is guilty <WH7563> of death: <WH4191> but <WH3588> he shall be surely put to death. <WH4191> <WH4191>

And ye shall take <WH3947> no <WH3808> satisfaction <WH3724> for him that is fled <WH5127> to <WH413> the city <WH5892> of his refuge, <WH4733> that he should come again <WH7725> to dwell <WH3427> in the land, <WH776> until <WH5704> the death <WH4194> of the priest. <WH3548>

So ye shall not <WH3808> pollute <WH2610> <WH853> the land <WH776> wherein <WH834> ye <WH859> are: for <WH3588> blood <WH1818> it <WH1931> defileth <WH2610> <WH853> the land: <WH776> and the land <WH776> cannot <WH3808> be cleansed <WH3722> of the blood <WH1818> that <WH834> is shed <WH8210> therein, but <WH3588> <WH518> by the blood <WH1818> of him that shed <WH8210> it.

Defile <WH2930> not <WH3808> therefore <WH853> the land <WH776> which <WH834> ye <WH859> shall inhabit, <WH3427> wherein <WH834> <WH8432> I <WH589> dwell: <WH7931> for <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
